thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 8 of 523
thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: I vowed to never order another prom dress on-line, after a terrible experience and losing almost $400. This company had a decent return policy and my daughter has had other friends order from here. Took the plunge and was very pleased. Used the size chart, ordered the dress. It was very nicely made and fit well. Will need to be a bit taken in, but quality was very good. I am very happy.
